## IDIDManager interface

Identifier manager interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IDIDManager extends IPluginMethodMap
```

<b>Extends:</b> [IPluginMethodMap](./core.ipluginmethodmap.md)

## Methods

| Method                                                                                  | Description                                                              |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [didManagerAddKey(args, context)](./core.ididmanager.didmanageraddkey.md)               | Adds a key to a DID Document                                             |
| [didManagerAddService(args, context)](./core.ididmanager.didmanageraddservice.md)       | Adds a service to a DID Document                                         |
| [didManagerCreate(args, context)](./core.ididmanager.didmanagercreate.md)               | Creates and returns a new identifier                                     |
| [didManagerDelete(args, context)](./core.ididmanager.didmanagerdelete.md)               | Deletes identifier                                                       |
| [didManagerFind(args)](./core.ididmanager.didmanagerfind.md)                            | Returns a list of managed identifiers                                    |
| [didManagerGet(args)](./core.ididmanager.didmanagerget.md)                              | Returns a specific identifier                                            |
| [didManagerGetByAlias(args)](./core.ididmanager.didmanagergetbyalias.md)                | Returns a specific identifier by alias                                   |
| [didManagerGetOrCreate(args, context)](./core.ididmanager.didmanagergetorcreate.md)     | Returns an existing identifier or creates a new one for a specific alias |
| [didManagerGetProviders()](./core.ididmanager.didmanagergetproviders.md)                | Returns a list of available identifier providers                         |
| [didManagerImport(args, context)](./core.ididmanager.didmanagerimport.md)               | Imports identifier                                                       |
| [didManagerRemoveKey(args, context)](./core.ididmanager.didmanagerremovekey.md)         | Removes a key from a DID Document                                        |
| [didManagerRemoveService(args, context)](./core.ididmanager.didmanagerremoveservice.md) | Removes a service from a DID Document                                    |
| [didManagerSetAlias(args, context)](./core.ididmanager.didmanagersetalias.md)           | Sets identifier alias                                                    |
